name: Beer Pong Champion 4000
description:
This is a cool exciting co-op beer pong game. It is not a traditional beer pong. You have to hit as many glasses as possible and get the other player drunk.

Player 1 controls: a and d for left and right and s to shoot

Player 2 controls: j and l for left and right and k to shoot

This game is probably the best beer pong game in the world, so download it and try.
